Health Information System (HIS)
Hospital Management Information System (HMIS)
Laboratory Information System (LIS)
An introduction of the current needs
Documentation
Email
GNU HEALTH is a Free / Libre, Health and Hospital Information System that provides the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: GNU HEALTH是一个免费/自由的健康和医院信息系统,提供以下功能。

trans-unit.source: GNU Health WebDAV server for Python 3
GNU Health also manages the internal processes of a health institution, such as calendars, financial management, billing, stock management, pharmacies or laboratories (LIMS)
trans-unit.target: GNU Health还可以管理医疗机构的内部流程,如日历、财务管理、账单、库存管理、药房或实验室(LIMS)等。

trans-unit.source: GNU Health combines the daily medical practice with state-of-the-art technology in bioinformatics and genetics. It provides a holistic approach to the person, from the biological and molecular basis of disease to the social and environmental determinants of health.
trans-unit.target: GNU Health将日常医疗实践与最先进的生物信息学和遗传学技术相结合。从疾病的生物和分子基础到健康的社会和环境决定因素,它提供了一种全面的方法。

trans-unit.source: GNU Health is a project of GNU Solidario. GNU Solidario is an Non-profit Non-goverment-Organization (NGO) that works globally, delivering health and education with free software.
trans-unit.target: GNU Health是GNU Solidario的一个项目。GNU Solidario是一个非营利的非政府组织,在全球范围内开展工作,利用自由软件提供健康和教育。

trans-unit.source: GNU Health is licensed under GPL v3+:
GNU Solidario hosts IWEEE and GnuHealthCon:
Health and education are the basis for the development and dignity of societies.
trans-unit.target: 健康和教育是社会发展和尊严的基础。

trans-unit.source: Homepage
In addition, you can show your long time commitment to GNU Health by becoming a member of GNU Solidario, so together we can further deliver Freedom and Equity in Healthcare around the World.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您可以成为GNU Solidario成员来表明您对GNU Health的长期承诺 ，因此我们可以共同在全球范围内进一步实现医疗保健的自由与公平。

trans-unit.source: In order to be elegible, we need the following information from you, your NGO or government:
trans-unit.target: 为了做到优雅,我们需要您、您的非政府组织或政府提供以下信息:

trans-unit.source: License
Need help to implement GNU Health ?
Please contect us and we’ll back to you as soon as possible:
trans-unit.target: 请与我们联系，我们将尽快与您联系：

trans-unit.source: Support GNU Health
The GNU Health Federation allows to interconnect heterogeneous nodes and build large federated health networks across a region, province or country.
trans-unit.target: 在GNU卫生联合会允许异构互连节点和跨区域，省或国家建设大型联合卫生服务网络。

trans-unit.source: The International Workshop on e-Health in Emerging Economies- a good way to support GNU Solidario and to get the latest on e-Health is to assist to the conferences.
trans-unit.target: 新兴经济体电子健康国际研讨会--支持GNU Solidario并获得电子健康最新信息的一个好方法是协助参加会议。

trans-unit.source: The project will use free software, both at the server and workstations
trans-unit.target: 该项目将在服务器和工作站使用免费软件。

trans-unit.source: There must be a commitment of knowledge transfer to the rest of the team.
trans-unit.target: 必须承诺向团队其他成员传授知识。

trans-unit.source: There will be a local designated person that will be in charge of the project and the know-how transfer to the rest of the community.This person must be committed to be from the beginning of the project until two years after its completion.
trans-unit.target: 将有一名当地指定人员负责项目和向社区其他成员传授技术,此人必须承诺从项目开始到项目完成后两年。

trans-unit.source: Twitter: @gnuhealth

We are committed to do our best in helping out projects that can improve the health of your country or region. We want the project to be a success, and since our resources are limited, we need to work together to make a great and sustainable project.
trans-unit.target: 我们致力于尽我们最大的努力去帮助那些能够改善贵国或地区健康状况的项目。我们希望项目能够成功,由于我们的资源有限,我们需要共同努力,使项目成为一个伟大而可持续的项目。

trans-unit.source: We will do our best to help you out with the implementation and training for the local team, to build local capacity and make your project sustainable.
trans-unit.target: 我们会尽最大努力帮助您实施和培训当地团队,建立当地的能力,使您的项目可持续发展。

trans-unit.source: Wikibooks: https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/GNU_Health/
You can also donate to our project via :
trans-unit.target: 您也可以通过以下方式向我们的项目捐款：
